评论详情: The quality seems to be very good.  There is no slippage in the shoulders. The waist is flattering without a belt. I'm thinking of getting another one for everyday wear.

评论概述: Not the same color looks like dusty blue
评论详情: Ugly

评论概述: Great piece for my ren costume
评论详情: I bought this to go under a corset, and I wanted something that had a nice sleeve detail.  I wear a size 12-14 and usually a large-medium in tops depending on fit.  I went by the sizing chart and found mine to be a little big.  If I was wearing it as a top on it's own then maybe I'd like it, since it would be a bit loose around the middle, but wearing it under a corset, I found that I needed it a tiny bit tighter then I might normally wear.  It was bulky around the decolletage area once everything was cinched.  But not too bad.  I'd highly recommend this.  The sleeves were gorgeous! and I loved how it all looked.

Love it! I bought the extra large but I think I probably could have sized it down to the large. It has a ton of stretch from all the elastic smocking. I originally purchased this to complete an outfit for a Renaissance Festival but this would be super cute with a pair of jeans.
This blouse is very flattering. Great Quality.

Bought this as part of my pirate costume and I'm very excited. Can't wait til I have everything so I can see it all together. Thick material, not sheer at all. Loose-fitting which makes it comfortable.

I love this shirt it’s adorable I ordered on in a L I typically wear a Medium the large fit great in the breast but was a little snug in the waist but not uncomfortable. I like this shirt so much I decided to order a second one in White this time I ordered the XL it fits exactly the same. I’m still happy with my purchase so I plan to keep both.

评论概述: Way thicker than expected and not true to size
评论详情: It was much heavier than I was expecting, and way too tight. I would have overheated had I tried to wear it to my event.

The quality of this shirt for the price is really good! It was comfortable and fit correct based on the sizing guide. I added a wide belt to my look for dressing up at a renfaire. I also worn an under shirt as this was a bit sheer. Others mentioned that the sleeve cuffs aren’t very adjustable but I didn’t have an issue with this since they fit. If you order the correct size I don’t think they will be an issue.
Liked the shirt. Made good. Mid-drift. Length not long. Waiting for my new shirt to come.

This top is super cute! The fabric is thick and has a comfortable stretch. I'm 38DD, 36in waist, 5'6", 198lbs. I purchased a XL. I love corset styled tops. The lacing on the side is functional, but delicate. You can gently adjust the sides. The length is good. The cute lace sleeves are banded with a button closure. I plan to order the black one as well. Good purchase!
The fabric is nice but from chest up is loose

评论概述: Great fit, very feminine and pretty.
评论详情: Looks great with my Victorian skirt. Very pretty blouse that I think will be very versatile with my wardrobe.

I ordered a size up based on reviews for bustier girls saying it ran small. I definitely think i could have sized down not up. Im a 38DDD and usually wear an XL. I ordered the 2XL and id say its true to size. Giving them five stars because thats my fault, not theirs. Ill be exchanging for a smaller size and color change (to fit my outfit, nothing wrong with the apricot at all). The fabric is so soft and not see through, when i originally tried it on i had on a dark green bra and you could t see it at all. The color is accurate and nothing was wonky with it. Cant wait to get my true size!

It fits in odd places and way to big in others. Its made of very cheap gabric and sleeves are VERY VERY puffy. Way puffyer than picture. This also kept ripping on me even though it was too large in most areas. The seams are very badly sewn together and its practically see through. The corset sidding is the only way to make it fir better and is very long for short people. Definitely change out the threadig it comes with and be careful of seams ripping. I would only wear this as a costume peice and nothing else. The only reason i havent returned it yet is because it is for a costume party coming up. Will probably turn it into a pillow after it rips more.
It's cute and comfy and sits well under a corset or cincher!

评论概述: Shirt did not meet my expectations
评论详情: The material is cheap and very stiff. The price is too high for this product. Not what I expected at all!!
Lovely but sized small.  Stretchy fabric but I don’t want to look like my blouse won a wet t shirt contest so order couple sizes up if you don’t like the wet suit look.

评论概述: Great value and very nice product
评论详情: I ordered this as part of a costume for a steampunk event where our belly dance troupe was performing. It arrived in plenty of time, the fit was great, and it is high quality. Be sure to order your size based on the picture of the chart included with the rest of the pictures of the top. That way you'll get the right size.

The shirt is very flattering and went great with my ren fair outfit however it was tight around the arms where the cuffs are, and they could only be loosened a tiny bit. The cuffs were uncomfortable with the temperature being 80 and getting a little sweaty. The shirt will also ride up if you don’t have a belt.
Made with good quality stretchy material. Super cute top to dress up my steam punk costume!

This is a cute shirt that worked well with my costume for Renn-fest. I wore it under a corset. Without anything over it I would not have worn it as it has a ruffle at the bottom that pops up like a tutu for a ballerina.
A little tight on my arms but otherwise perfect. Highly recommend.

This shirt does have a texture to it that makes it appear higher quality than it is which is nice for the price and the pleather arm bands are adjustable but be warry if you have smaller arms. I had to restring them in a different way so they would sit snug.

Got a Large (if I remember correctly) I love the fabric since it gives a little stretch. It is a little tight in the tummy but nothing I personally can't fix. But fits good just the lace is a little itchy that could be due to me not washing it at first.

I love the look of this and was really looking forward to wearing it with a super cute skirt, but the shoulders are so wide it keeps sliding off. There isn't any way to fix the problem, so I have to pin it to my bra straps. That works. The rest of it fits perfectly and is adorable.

评论概述: definitely needs some love with an iron to get all the floofy bits ...
评论详情: Very well made, side laces came as a tangled mess, definitely needs some love with an iron to get all the floofy bits pretty. Very flattering stretchy material

This material is actually very soft with a little spandex feel so it fits perfectly ( if you go by their size chart ) I wished it came in red though so I’m having to dye it ( for costume ) but all and all it works 👌🏻

评论概述: Perfect top for a swamp witch costume!
评论详情: The original swamp witch costume I wanted was out of stock so I decided to piece together one. I felt this style top was perfect for what I was going for.  Loved and preferred the off shoulder sleeves as I felt it added a little sexiness to it. The cuffed sleeves were nice as it added color and were able to be as tight or loose as you wanted. The only thing I did not like is that it had a tendency to ride up a little the more I moved resulting in me having to readjust from time to time. If not, the top went a little too high up on the chest as well as the bottom feeling like it wasn’t down low enough. Overall, I’m pleased with it.

Thin materials but not such that it looks like it with shred while wearing it. The faux leather around the arms sticks to the skin a bit (somewhat annoying). I bought a 2XL - weigh 192 lbs and am 5'2" and it fit well. Doesn't accentuate belly like many similar pieces do. Came a couple inches below belly button. Good piece for ren faire.

I purchased a large because I'm top heavy, and worry about tops not fitting. I could have gone with a medium and it would have been fine but the large was just fine too. It's comfortable, light weight, and is great for those long hot days at the Ren fairs.

Very cute shirt. Worked perfectly for the pictures I took. However, it was a bit uncomfortable with the seams. It rubbed skin a bit. Nothing that can’t be tolerated.  The leather bits were the most comfortable part of the shirt. I still would purchase again with this in mind.
I’m so happy with my order. Love the color.

评论概述: Should have sized up. “Leather” on Sleeve doesn’t stretch.
评论详情: I bought a size Large, but definitely should have gone up a size, if only because I think it would have fit better around my arms, and been a bit longer. (The “leather” cuff was a bit tight). I’m 5’2”, about 160. Busty, & with a larger than needed waist, and less than toned arms. (LOL).  To wear a corset belt with it, and have shirt material sticking out below, a larger shirt would have been better for me.  THAT SAID… if you have a larger chest, don’t mind the length, and your arms are more toned, you could still wear a Large. (Assuming you’re short & thicker like me). It’s stretchy material. Also, because the leather on the arms is tighter, it helps keep the top of the shirt down over the shoulders, like most would want to wear it anyway.  *I washed with dark colors on Delicate, and let it air dry. No shrinkage.
I knew the leather arm straps were going to be tight so I have a plan to alter. Shirts doesn’t sit well at the bottom but maybe a wash will help

The leatherette armbands are very tight.  It may fit many women, but I lift weights so my upper arms are a little larger.  It was also hard to move the arms easily into a comfortable position on my arms.

评论概述: A bodice ripper without the ripping.
评论详情: I got more action from this than from a black lace nightie. Who knew.
OMG. I love love love this top.  Everything about this top is perfect.
Very very tight in the arms. Ordered an XL as recommended. It’s a little short and the arms are just oooof! Size up.
I bought this for a Renaissance fair. Great shirt. It is true to the size. I would recommend washing according to the directions.
The perfect addition to my bar maiden costume. By the looks of it, once I wash it, the "leather" will start peeling. I'll update then.

评论概述: have to agree with everyone else
评论详情: going to a renfaire for the first time and i’m trying to plan an outfit. this will be a really great base shirt and i’m excited to work on the rest of it. a lot of reviews say things along the lines of there’s too much material in the bust and tight arm sleeves, and they are absolutely right. the sleeves weren’t unbearable but for prolonged wear they were just not gonna cut it, so i’m in the process of removing the sleeve caps to replace with more forgiving ones, and later i plan to take in an inch from the bust area. one thing i did see a lot of is that other reviews say it’s too short but i don’t agree with mine, i think the length is fine. if you don’t mind altering i’d say it’s a great top for the price

Never before has my chest looked so filled than in this outfit. I felt like a medival goddess. This was for a medieval wedding I attended and by god it did the job. I love this seller and will def buy more in the future if I go to ren fairs. Never written a review before but this is hands down worth it. So happy with how it looks. I’m 5’ 2. Definetly get a corset to match with it, I think it looks so much better this way
Except the arms can be a little tight.  Or I just got big arms. Lol
Stretch at middle makes it pretty versatile size wise but I wish I sized down. The top above the waist is a little baggy, as are the arm cuffs. Fabric and color is nice
Wore this to RenFaire and got tons of compliments

评论概述: Very beautiful top, could use more length in the larger size, it's kind of a belly shirt.
评论详情: It is an absolutely gorgeous top, and went perfectly with the bodice and skirt I bought.  I got a 3x (to make sure it was loose and poofy) and if it weren't for the length I'd probably just wear it as a cute top by itself.  It probably fits a S or M perfectly,  but in the larger size they could use a longer ruched section and a little more fabric on the bottom.  As it is, its definitely a belly shirt,  so if you're cool with that this is the perfect top for you.  I just prefer to keep my squishy midsection more covered. For the purpose for which I bought it though (under the bodice) I am exceedingly happy.

评论概述: Exactly as pictured, a bit see through
评论详情: Exactly as pictured, the shirt laces up at the front and the sleeves nicely. It is see-through, however, so you should also purchase a nude or white bra if you plan to wear one and don't have one already. I elected to wear something over it because I didn't try it on until the morning of the Faire (my bad), and that worked as well. The shirt has some steampunk vibes, too, you could definitely get away with styling it in that fashion. Overall I would recommend this to a friend.

Very cute shirt. I bought it for my costume for the renaissance faire but ended up returning it since the arm bands were too small for me and they can't be adjusted. However I did see someone at the faire wearing this shirt and it looked so good on her! I would also recommend sizing up if you want it to bunch up around your chest like it does in the picture.

I cut mine at the top. It's as pictured. Sits on shoulders weird. Frumpy and not comfortable would be comfortable if it hugged. But even elastic around the waist is loose. Even if I got a size smaller it would still sit on shoulders weird and arms would be too tight.

I bought this for cosplay. The material is a good quality, soft and breathable. I was skeptical, but am pleasantly surprised. The arm cuffs fit me just fine, and I am a more athletic build. However, I could see how they could be a problem. They fit snug.
Helped tie my outfit together. A bit more in the *modest* side which is what I wanted. Only complaint is the pleather on the arms was a little tight but probably stretchable if I put in the effort.

评论概述: Crop top fit and skinny arms but I like it!
评论详情: I have used this about 3 times now I was hoping the arms would stretch a little. They do NOT. The ties do not actually tighten or loosen anything. They are just for looks but it looks GOOD! I used it tucked under a skirt and that is the way I prefer it, I don’t think I would use it not tucked in as it is not flattering. It is holding up well so far and I am surprised. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments! Not see through and very stretchy everywhere but the arms.
Loved it. Really cute. Only thing is it's a little shorter then I thought it would be. It looks really good though
A value product that looks and feels lovely.

评论概述: Really cute - just a tad small
评论详情: I wasn't sure what size to order this in. Reviews were kind of all over the place, so I went with the ones that said that it ran big and ordered an XL (I usually wear an XXL in tops). It fit well in the bust, but I did think that the cuffs were a little snug. I'll probably just cut them a little to add more room. This shirt is also pretty short, but I'm tucking it into a skirt, so this doesn't really matter to me. All in all, I liked this purchase!

评论概述: I love the style and it fits everywhere except the bust
评论详情: I love the style and it fits everywhere except the bust. I ordered a small, based on the size chart (I am a size 4 to 6 up top). It is true to size everywhere but the bust area doesn't not simply "gather" with the draw string, it hangs in the front and will have to be altered by a seamstress so that I can have it ready in time for an event. Although I am happy with most of it, please be advised that the arm cuffs, even extended with the drawstring can be a little snug.

评论概述: You get what you pay for.
评论详情: Fit pretty nice — the arms were a little small. Not entirely see through but not super thick. The stretch at the waist and shoulders was as described. I was pleased with it, especially considering the price.

My biggest issue was that it came in with a rip already in one of the sleeves, however for the price you are paying it is very poorly made. Sheer, thin fabric, with pleather that is very unpleasant to look at.  For a Halloween costume this might be the shirt for you, but it just isn’t for me. I could get a far better quality shirt with a similar look for roughly the same price at a ren fair. (The next fair I can go to isn’t until spring and I was hoping for a piece that would boost my spirits until then)

评论概述: Bought to wear at Ren Faire
评论详情: I bought this to wear to the Renaissance Festival under a corset. The overall fit is a little large (I'm a busty size 18/20), and the sleeves lace up so you can make them fit comfortably. The bottom kind of bunched up under my corset as the day wore on, but I was working so someone who was casually strolling around the Faire might not have the same issues. I usually try to add a piece or two to my Ren Faire wardrobe each season, and I think this piece was a good investment.

I wore this to RenFaire and got a lot of complements! I love that it really looks the part, as far as Renaissance . It's very light and airy, very comfortable to wear. I would definitely purchase again!

评论概述: It is short, and it runs very large.
评论详情: Do yourself a favor and size down! I am very busty (40 G) and I normally wear a 2x top. I ordered a large and it was still huge. I could have easily worn a medium. The top is much shorter than I expected. Luckily I was wearing it under a corset. Think crop top, it isn’t going to cover you fully alone. Having said that, it worked out nicely for my Ren Faire costume and I was not unhappy with it.
Great quality, true fit, period correct look

I bought this shirt to be part of my Ghost Pirate costume this year. It’s perfect! I read the other reviews and did purchase a small when normally I would buy a medium. I am larger on top and the small fits great. It’s a tad see through but a strapless bra will fix that. I recommend!
Shirt is very nice, however it is a little shorter than I would’ve liked, but overall very happy with the shirt.
Light weight fabric, natural beige color with faux leather on the arms. Fit is true to size. Sexy off the shoulder look makes wearing this shirt fun.

Bought for a pirate theme costume, but nice enough to wear everyday. The shirt was very comfortable, slightly snug at the sleeve cuffs, but you can leave the ties looser to compensate. I’m a size small/medium and I bought a small.  It fit well and I was mostly really surprised at how comfortable it was all night long, often shirts with this much elastic shirring are not.  The elastic and shirt fabric is soft and washed well, I did hang to dry.

The leather-cuffed ones have gorgeously textured fabric, vertical stripes of a different weave - zoom in and you’ll see it, and I don’t think I see it on the non-leather ones - an unusual detail that really adds to the richness of this lovely top.  Yes, it’s weirdly short and wouldn’t work without a corset or other outer layer - otherwise it’s true to size, and it’s comfortable to wear.  I’m definitely buying more - I love the copper-brown that I have.

The shirt is well made and very pretty. However it runs shorter than what the picture looks like. In addition, there is a lot of extra space in the breast area. I ordered an extra large and I'm a size 38 DDD with extra room. All in all the only issue I had was that the shirt doesn't cover my full torso (being slightly too short.)
A little adjustment the pleather got very sticky to my arm. Humidity was high but ouch pulling off.

Just received this in the mail today. It’s a lot lighter than the picture shows, the arms are very tight and didn’t quite fit my arms but can make do with the fit. If you have any type of chest it’s going to make the shirt more of a belly shirt. Then lastly the strings were missing on one of the sleeves.

Bought for my daughter for her costume, steampunk elf. She wore it for the Renaissance fair, halloween day at school, and trick or treat. She loves it. Only size issue is with the bust. If you have a smaller bust it could be an issue.

评论概述: Too flimsy and orders a size too big.
评论详情: I think I got a size too big. The top part of it covers your boobs, but the next line dropped way down, and then bottom half rode up my stomach. So it wasn't long enough for me and was overall too flimsy. I did return it and opted for something else.
Priced correctly for quality...too flimsy no structure

评论概述: A bit too short, needs a waist corset over top
评论详情: It's a great costume piece but I had small issues with it being too short. It kept riding up which causes the boobs to look very unfilled. I'm 5'3 and 115 lbs and a small fit fine. Also I wore a 34 B bra and it was pretty unfilled unless I kept it tucked into my corset.

The leather style sleeves kind of suck because even though they adjust they're still limited. As far as the rest of the top, I'm obsessed with it. I'm a size 20, busty and big middle, this is a great fit. You will need something to cover the bottom half though because it rides high.

评论概述: Not the best fit, not the worst.
评论详情: The shirt fit okay.  Seemed a bit short, and a little big on top.  If I would have gone up a size for length it would have been way to big on top, and if I had sized down for the top it would have been too short.  It worked fine with a corset for a pirate costume.

I'm in love with this top. The material is thinner than expected but not see through. The leather cuffs on the sleeves do unlace, however the do not stretch much so if you have bigger arms I'd say look elsewhere. The material is comfortable and flattering. I do recommend wearing something high waisted with this top though because it can slip up a bit. Overall I'm incredibly happy with this purchase.
Love the color. Arm bands are a bit tight but I made it work cause I love the style
I really liked the way this shirt looks under a corset I got for an outfit, but the fit was a bit too large by itself. Under the corset still looked great and it felt comfortable on my skin

评论概述: Good value, a little strange fit
评论详情: This top was a good value and is perfect for steampunk, renfair, and cosplay. I ordered an XL and the off the shoulder section was just slightly too big, but, it stayed in place well when worn with an underbust corset. Also, the length was a little shorter than I anticipated. Overall, not a bad purchase.
The sleeves are too large around and can’t be tightened without looking terrible.

评论概述: Cute outfit; but Strings are too long
评论详情: Cute shirt; but fit a little big and the shoe strings are tooooo long even when when trying to triple tie it, the string is still too long which takes away the cuteness of the shirt.

评论概述: Sleeves too tight but otherwise great!
评论详情: I absolutely love this shirt! My only issue was how tight the sleeves were. I was only able to wear the shirt for an hour before it became very uncomfortable.

评论概述: Runs a bit large but I’m 100% ordering more
评论详情: I added the waist belt but the shirt is so comfortable. I’m 6’ 180lbs and I got a size large. I probably could have gone medium. Most comfortable shirt I own.

Gorgeous too! I own a lot of peasant blouse tops and this is definitely one of the nicest I’ve purchased in a while! Only complaint is that the sleeves were too attached to the bust area, but that was easily remedied with some basic sewing :) totally a personal preference so I’m giving it 5 stars still!  Will likely purchase more in different colors and different sleeve types!

评论概述: This is not Cotton fabric as described
评论详情: This is Not Cotton,it is polyester .  I wanted a Cotton Shirt. I specifically read the product information and only ordered it because it said it was Cotton. Very disappointing that the description lied about the fabric.
Held up well for my event
The look of this top was just what I wanted for a swashbuckler style costume for a ren-fest. I wore it under a corset, so the fit wasn't too much of a problem, but by itself it is huge!

评论概述: Love it! Super special detail on sleeves...
评论详情: Absolutely stunning top, modern take on Renaissance/Steampunk! Soft, gauze like material, yet, not too thin, great all year wearability. The fabric is very stretchy and creates a lovely silhouette,  great with jeans or dressed up with a skirt.  I'm usually a size Small/Medium, (5'6", 130 lbs, 34DD), based on other reviews, I ordered a Medium and it fits well, as expected and is very comfy! Definitely recommend, very easy, breezy, boho look!

Not very flattering, as the cinched area is very wide on the waist. I measured the waist of the shirt as soon as I got it because I could tell right away it would be too large. I got a small and it measures 28in waist. Overall just largely proportioned in bust and waist for a "small". Nice material. Maybe a waist corset will make it look nicer?

评论概述: The material quality was good and not cheap!
评论详情: The top is very stretchy. I usually wear a large, I measured myself and ordered per the sites size chart. I purchased a medium. It is just a bit loose in the breast area. A larger breasted person will fit well. So keep the breast area in mind when ordering.

评论概述: Runs big, fits weird under arms
评论详情: Purchased with recommended measurements.  It fit around the waist fine as there is some stretch, bust was an ok fit and my DDD’s werent falling out, but the armpit area was insanely huge and isnt flattering at all. Now i have to decide if im gonna suck it up or go to the renn faire topless.

Very flattering.. can be worn on or off the shoulder. Size is proper. Order a 2XL and it is a typical American 2XL. Especially in the bust area and in the shoulders. ( Female with very wyt man wide shoulders but bust area is more asian size)

Quality in fabric is good and size runs a bit bigger. I ordered a large and should of purchased a medium.  My sleeves fit great, wasnt tight. It does run short (length wise), was waayy above my belly button but I'll be wearing a corset with it so that doesnt bother me.  It did smell weird? Hoping once it washed, that goes away.Overall satisfied with this purchase.

评论概述: Super comfortable, easy to put on, and cute with a corset!
评论详情: I bought this for the renaissance festival, to go under a corset as part of a costume. It fit great and looked great, I was aiming for pirate themed. It's soft and stretchy, but fair warning the leather on the ends of the sleeves is not stretchy.

评论概述: A great shirt to wear under a corset
评论详情: I purchased this shirt to wear to a Steampunk event. It is a cropped shirt, so please be aware of that if you are going to purchase it. I knew this going in, and planned to wear it under a fashion corset, and it worked beautifully. The shirt is well made and fits beautifully. I definitely recommend if you're looking for a nice Steampunk shirt.
Good quality! Perfect size I love it very happy with it.
Mine fits perfect I love the fabric I wasnt excepting it to be so night clubby, but i can't wait to wear it out whenever i get the chance
Everything fits on it but booby area. Very large there. I have your average sized c cups. It made for like triple DDs. Other then that. I like it.
